trust
Class BayesTrust

java.lang.Object
  trust.BayesTrust
All Implemented Interfaces:
TrustInterface
public class BayesTrust
extends java.lang.Object
implements TrustInterface

Implementation of the paper "B-trust: Bayesian Trust Framework for Pervasive Computing" by Daniele Quercia, Stephen Hailes, Licia Capra (2006). Catalin Patulea, Chris Fournier
